text:
üåøLocated just beside Khoo Teck Puat Hospital, the Yishun Pond Park Promenade offers a spacious open space amidst lush greenery and facing the serene calm water of the Pond.
‚òòÔ∏èA great location for KTP Hospital's recovering patients and visitors to have some outdoor fresh air within a nature setting.
Everytime I walk here, I see a variety of migratory birds either by the water edge, at wetland vegetation in pond or soaring in the sky...nature's gifts.

Saw an eagle being chased away by 8 crows, lots of yellow vented bulbuls n m still wondering if dats a purple heron in the clump of plants in the middle of the pond The fountain is still sleeping cld b too early for it

Another amazing spot in bustling Yishun Town. Kudos to NParks planners who pioneered the concept of linking up the "pond" with the park across the road, sand integrating in the Safra clubhouse.

NParks also retained the original trees, shrubbery, and edible roots. During durian seasons, scavengers have been known to hold all-night vigils. Heartlanders can even expect tapioca and various edible greens growing wild here. But harvesting may not be a good idea.

I like the pond park as it is near my brother's flat, and I like to come to exercise with Xuan and Yuan, especially when then have exam, this exercise will destress them. People in sports attires walk, jog and run here. Hospital patients are accompanied by family members to come to the park and exercise. Very relaxing and refreshing!
